title: Features
agenda: Beautiful and useful calender, to easily check your schedule.
speed: Argo is more than 6x as fast as Magister, to quickly check when and where your next class will be.
settings: You can set up Argo any which way you want it, with many settings to customize.
opensource: Argo is open-source, so you can check out our code!
customizable: You can assign custom names to subjects to customize your experience.
themes: Argo has a  dark, a light and even an OLED theme.
